Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.approval

Class ApprovalSessionBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ejbca.core.ejb.approval.ApprovalSessionBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApprovalSession, ApprovalSessionLocal, ApprovalSessionRemote
    public class ApprovalSessionBean
extends Object
implements ApprovalSessionLocal, ApprovalSessionRemote
    Keeps track of approval requests and their approval or rejects.
    Version:
    $Id: ApprovalSessionBean.java 28920 2018-05-11 14:19:18Z mikekushner $

        @PostConstruct
public void postConstruct()

      • addApprovalRequest

        public int addApprovalRequest​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                              ApprovalRequest approvalRequest)
                       throws ApprovalException
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalSession
        Method used to add an approval to database. The main key of an approval is the approvalId, which should be unique for one administrator doing one type of action, requesting the same action twice should result in the same approvalId If the approvalId already exists, with a non expired approval, a new approval request is added to the database. An approvalException is thrown otherwise
        Specified by:
        addApprovalRequest in interface ApprovalSession
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        approvalRequest - req
        Returns:
        the database identifier of the created request
        Throws:
        ApprovalException - if an approval already exists for this request.

      • editApprovalRequest

        public void editApprovalRequest​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                int id,
                                ApprovalRequest approvalRequest)
                         throws ApprovalException
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalSession
        Changes an approval request. The administrator will be blacklisted from approving the request. This operation changes the approvalId (the hash of the request), but not the id of the request.
        Specified by:
        editApprovalRequest in interface ApprovalSession
        Parameters:
        admin - administrator, will be added to the list of admins who have edited the request.
        id - the unique id of the approvalrequest, not the same as approvalId.
        approvalRequest - modified request
        Throws:
        ApprovalException - if the approval request does not exist, or may not be edited.

        Description copied from interface: ApprovalSession

        Specified by:
        removeApprovalRequest in interface ApprovalSession
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        id - the unique id of the approvalrequest, not the same as approvalId

      • isApproved

        public int isApproved​(int approvalId,
                      int step)
               throws ApprovalException,
                      ApprovalRequestExpiredException
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalSession
        Checks if the approval request by the given identifier is approved or not. This method should be used by action requiring the requesting administrator to poll to see if it have been approved and only have one step, otherwise use the method with the step parameter. If the return value is: 0 the request is approved (ApprovalDataVO.STATUS_APROVED) >0 the request requires so many more approvals left <0 the request has any other status
        Specified by:
        isApproved in interface ApprovalSession
        Parameters:
        approvalId - the approval ID of the request
        step - the given step
        Returns:
        the number of approvals left if still waiting for approval, 0 (ApprovalDataVO.STATUS_APROVED) if approved otherwise the ApprovalDataVO.STATUS constants returned indicating the status.
        Throws:
        ApprovalException - if approvalId does not exist
        ApprovalRequestExpiredException - thrown one time if one or more of the approvals has expired, once notified it wont throw it anymore. But If the request is multiple steps and user have already performed that step, the exception will always be thrown.

      • isApproved

        public int isApproved​(int approvalId)
               throws ApprovalException,
                      ApprovalRequestExpiredException
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalSession
        Checks if the approval request by the given identifier is approved or not. This method should be used by action requiring the requesting administrator to poll to see if it have been approved and only have one step, otherwise use the method with the step parameter. If the return value is: 0 the request is approved (ApprovalDataVO.STATUS_APROVED) >0 the request requires so many more approvals left <0 the request has any other status
        Specified by:
        isApproved in interface ApprovalSession
        Parameters:
        approvalId - the ID of the request
        Returns:
        the number of approvals left if still waiting for approval, 0 (ApprovalDataVO.STATUS_APROVED) if approved otherwise the ApprovalDataVO.STATUS constants returned indicating the status.
        Throws:
        ApprovalException - if approvalId does not exist
        ApprovalRequestExpiredException - thrown one time if one or more of the approvals has expired, once notified it wont throw it anymore. But If the request is multiple steps and user have already performed that step, the exception will always be thrown.

      • markAsStepDone

        public void markAsStepDone​(int approvalId,
                           int step)
                    throws ApprovalException,
                           ApprovalRequestExpiredException
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalSession
        Method that marks a certain step of a a non-executable approval as done. When the last step is performed the approval is marked as EXPRIED.
        Specified by:
        markAsStepDone in interface ApprovalSession
        Parameters:
        approvalId - ID
        step - in approval to mark
        Throws:
        ApprovalException - if approvalId does not exist,
        ApprovalRequestExpiredException - Fail

      • findWaitingForApprovalApprovalDataLocal

        public List<ApprovalData> findWaitingForApprovalApprovalDataLocal()
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalSessionLocal
        Returns a list of all approval requests whose status is WAITING_FOR_APPROVAL only (aka. not including status APPROVED). This method is called mainly when upgrading older approval requests to EJBCA 6.6.0 or later.
        Specified by:
        findWaitingForApprovalApprovalDataLocal in interface ApprovalSessionLocal
        Returns:
        A list of all approval requests whose status is WAITING_FOR_APPROVAL

      • query

        public List<ApprovalDataVO> query​(Query query,
                                  int index,
                                  int numberofrows,
                                  String caAuthorizationString,
                                  String endEntityProfileAuthorizationString)
                           throws IllegalQueryException
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalSessionLocal
        Method returning a list of approvals from the give query
        Specified by:
        query in interface ApprovalSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        query - should be a Query object containing ApprovalMatch and TimeMatch
        index - where the ResultSet should start
        numberofrows - maximum number of rows
        caAuthorizationString - a list of authorized CA Ids in the form 'cAId=... OR cAId=...'
        endEntityProfileAuthorizationString - a list of authorized end entity profile ids in the form '(endEntityProfileId=... OR endEntityProfileId=...) objects only
        Returns:
        a List of ApprovalDataVO, never null
        Throws:
        IllegalQueryException - fail

      • queryByStatus

        public List<ApprovalDataVO> queryByStatus​(boolean includeUnfinished,
                                          boolean includeProcessed,
                                          boolean includeExpired,
                                          Date startDate,
                                          Date endDate,
                                          Date expiresBefore,
                                          int index,
                                          int numberofrows,
                                          String caAuthorizationString,
                                          String endEntityProfileAuthorizationString)
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalSessionLocal
        Returns a list of non-expired approvals with the given statuses.
        Specified by:
        queryByStatus in interface ApprovalSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        includeUnfinished - Includes requests that haven't been executed or rejected yet.
        includeProcessed - Includes requests that have been approved and executed, or rejected.
        includeExpired - Includes requests that have expired.
        startDate - Include requests from this date and later, or null for no limit.
        endDate - Include requests up to this date, or null for no limit.
        expiresBefore - When searching unfinished requests, include only those that expire before this date. Set to null to include all.
        index - where the ResultSet should start
        numberofrows - maximum number of rows
        caAuthorizationString - a list of authorized CA Ids in the form 'cAId=... OR cAId=...'
        endEntityProfileAuthorizationString - a list of authorized end entity profile ids in the form '(endEntityProfileId=... OR endEntityProfileId=...) objects only
        Returns:
        a List of ApprovalDataVO, never null

      • sendApprovalNotifications

        public void sendApprovalNotifications​(ApprovalRequest approvalRequest,
                                      ApprovalProfile approvalProfile,
                                      ApprovalData approvalData,
                                      boolean expired)
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalSessionLocal
        Send all work-flow related approval notifications given the last added Approval to the approvalsPerformed.
        Specified by:
        sendApprovalNotifications in interface ApprovalSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        approvalRequest - the approval request
        approvalProfile - the profile determining the approval work flow
        approvalData - the ApprovalData object referring to the approval request
        expired - should be set to true if the notification is due to expiration of the approval request

      • updateApprovalRequest

        public void updateApprovalRequest​(int approvalDataId,
                                  ApprovalRequest approvalRequest)
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalSessionLocal
        Updates the approval request field for an approval. Doesn't do any authorization checks.
        Specified by:
        updateApprovalRequest in interface ApprovalSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        approvalDataId - the ID of an approvalData object (not the approvalID hash)
        approvalRequest - the updated approval request

      • extendApprovalRequestNoAuth

        public void extendApprovalRequestNoAuth​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                        int approvalDataId,
                                        long extendForMillisParam)
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalSessionLocal
        Moves the expiration date forward and sets the status for Waiting for Approval. Doesn't do any authorization checks.
        Specified by:
        extendApprovalRequestNoAuth in interface ApprovalSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - The administrator requesting extension of the request. Used for audit logging only.
        approvalDataId - Id of the approval request
        extendForMillisParam - The new expiration date will be set to current time plus this number of milliseconds

      • getIdFromApprovalId

        public int getIdFromApprovalId​(int approvalId)
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalSessionLocal
        Method that takes an approvalId (hash) and returns the request's ID (the value in the "Id" column in the "ApprovalData" table in the database)
        Specified by:
        getIdFromApprovalId in interface ApprovalSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        approvalId - the request hash (approvalId in the database)
        Returns:
        the ID of the approval request or 0 if it does not exist

      • getRemainingNumberOfApprovals

        public int getRemainingNumberOfApprovals​(int requestId)
                                  throws ApprovalException,
                                         ApprovalRequestExpiredException
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalSession
        Gives the remaining number of approvals for a given approval request
        Specified by:
        getRemainingNumberOfApprovals in interface ApprovalSession
        Parameters:
        requestId - the request ID of the approval
        Returns:
        the remaining number of approvals for this request (with 0 meaning that the request has passed) or -1 if the request has been denied
        Throws:
        ApprovalException - if an approval request with the given ID was not found.
        ApprovalRequestExpiredException - if approval request was expired before having a definite status
